name: Bitcoin Bit
description: BitcoinBit (BCB) is a digital asset designed to inherit and modernize the monetary philosophy of Bitcoin. It operates on the Ethereum blockchain using the Proof-of-Stake consensus mechanism and focuses on sustainable, decentralized value transfer. With a fixed supply of 21 million tokens, BitcoinBit aims to offer an alternative to energy-intensive mining through PoS while incorporating ESG principles and real-world financial integration.
